sections.heading: Decree; alimony; division of property; criteria; modification; revocation; termination
sections.text: When dissolution of a marriage is decreed, the court may order payment of such alimony by one party to the other and division of property as may be reasonable, having regard for the circumstances of the parties, d

sections.heading: 365, R.R.S.1943, Reissue 1978, is limited in its application to those situations in which, except for section 42-372, R
sections.text: R.S.1943, Reissue 1978, the court could not otherwise modify or vacate the decree. Howard v. Howard, 207 Neb. 468, 299 N.W.2d 442 (1980).
